backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing a query function that computes horsepower from torque and RPM.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping features to frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Existing short summaries for several frontend files including App, ResultsPanel, index.css, and tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component handling input validation, horsepower calculation from weight and trap speed, UI layout, and results rendering.
frontend/src/components/ResultsPanel.tsx: Results display card showing calculated horsepower, input summary, disclaimer, and badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the userâ€™s identity using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hooks managing login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme color variables, global transitions, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and image needs for the horsepower calculator app.
